note: Grumpy person living in the Southeast US. A bookish nerd, but also a dumbass. I mostly boost stuff and I have the same sense of humor as a twelve year old, so if you’d prefer not to see a lot of absurdist dick jokes maybe don’t follow me. Really, no one at all should follow me. Why are you even looking at my profile? Your integrity as a person has been compromised just by reading this.

fields.name: PFP:
fields.value: A painting of a lady in a white fin de siecle dress boredly  petting a black cat perched on her shoulder.
